parlimenthu manthri mohomad musammil mahathata rupiyal laksha thunsiyayak laba di ohuwa wipakshaya wetha bili ba ganimata daru kuta prayathnayata erehiwa nithimaya kriyamarga ganimata jathika nidahas peramune sabhapathi , parlimenthu manthri wimal wirawansha mahatha sudanam weyi.mohomad musammil mahathage sahaya labaganima sandaha sarath fonseka mahathage parshwaya samanga kala sakachcha ha mudal labagath ayuru dakwena handa pata saha widiyo pata siyallama, idiripath karamin nithimaya kriyamarga ganimata thiranaya kara athi bawa wirawansha mahatha prakasha karayi.aandu pakshaye manthriwarun mudal laba di biliba ganime jathi drohi kumanthranayaheli kirima sandaha siya upades matha musammil manthriwaraya dawantha awadanamak ganimin me kriyawa sidukala bawath me mangin wipakshaye ninditha bawa nawatha wathawak ratata heli kala bawath wirawansha mahatha sandahan kele ya.parlimenthu manthri wimal wirawansha mahatha me bawa sandahan kele baththaramulla pihiti ema paksha karyalaye di eeye (17) pawathi madhya sakachchawakata sahabhagi wemini.ehidi wadiduratath adahas dak wu wimal wirawansha mahatha sandahan kele wishala mudalak laba demin mohomad musammil mahatha biliba ganimata daru uthsahaya pilibanda nithimaya kriyamarga ganimata adala upades laba ganima sandaha nithignya kandayamak da hamu wu bawayi.mohomad musammil mahatha bili ba ganime kumanthranaye madihathkaru lesa mayon musthapa mahatha katayuthu kara athi athara ema kriyawaliya pitupasa ranil wikramasinha , rawi karunanayaka , malik samarawikrama mangala samarawira wani ayada sitina bawath wirawansha mahatha sandahan kele ya.adala pudgalayan samanga mohomad musammil mahatha sidukara athi sakachchawala handa pata saha widiyo pata kihipayak me wana wita madhyata nikuth kara athi athara nithi upades matha thawath widiyo pata ha hada pata kihipayak madhyata idiripath nokarana bawath manthriwaraya pawasiya.madhyata idiripath nokarana handa pata athara suwisheshi handa pata kihipayak da wana athara musammil mahathata laba dun mudal bagaye mudalwalata amatharawa watina liyakiyawili kihipayak da pawathina bawath wirawansha mahatha kiya.me siyalu lipi lekhana nithimaya kriyamarga sandaha yoda ganna athara me siddhiya anawaranaya wimath samangama wipakshaya wiwidha wu paraspara prakasha sidukarana bawath ee mahatha kiya.
